title: Statistical Research Project
description: Students will have an opportunity to conduct some basic research activities in a topic of interest. The topics are either proposed by a faculty member or they could be some real-world problems from companies, research institutes, etc. Students could either work on a project individually or in a group of up to three students. Students will learn how to conduct a literature search, review critically selected papers, solve problems, write a report, and present and discuss their findings. This is a core module for the MSc (Statistics) coursework programme. A student will normally take this module in the final semester.
prerequisite:
ST5201/ST5201X Statistical Foundations of Data Science
and
ST5202/ST5202X Applied Regression Analysis
